changeSet.sql: UPDATE muzimaforms_form mform JOIN form form ON mform.form_id = form.form_id SET mform.name = form.name, mform.description = form.description

column.name: name
column.value: Patient Identifier auto-generation

column.name: description
column.value: Defines whether or not patient patient identifier should be autogenerated during processing mUzima registration data. This should be set to 'true' if autogeneration is needed

column.name: name
column.value: Patient Identifier auto-generation Source name

column.name: description
column.value: Specifies name of auto-generation source defined in ID-GEN module

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM muzima_setting where property = 'PatientCohort.AutoDownload'

column.name: name
column.value: Patient Cohort auto-download

column.name: description
column.value: Defines whether cohorts are downloaded automatically to muzima

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_task_config where schedulable_class = 'org.openmrs.module.muzima.task.ReportDesignTask'

changeSet.comment: rel3
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO scheduler_task_config (name, description, schedulable_class, start_time, start_time_pattern, repeat_interval, start_on_startup, started, created_by, date_created, changed_by, date_changed, last_execution_time, uuid ) VALUES ('Auto Generate Patient Reports', NULL, 'org.openmrs.module.muzima.task.ReportDesignTask', '2020-06-26 00:00:00','MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss',86400, 1, 1, 1, now(), NULL, NULL, NULL, uuid());
